title: Ginger
description:
A segment of ginger root with light brown skin and a yellowish core.

Can be used to talk about ginger root or roots in general. Can also be used to talk about spice, flavor, cooking, or baking. May also be also be used to talk redheads.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the ginger emoji is a vibrant, slightly curved root with a textured skin that hints at its earthy origins, enhanced by Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle shading. Its warm, reddish-brown hue is rich and inviting, and the soft rounded edges give it a friendly, approachable feel. This emoji is commonly used to represent the spice itself, or metaphorically, to signify something zesty, spicy, or full of energy in digital conversations, embodying the lively spirit of Apple's design.
